dct_title_s: Sanborn Fire Insurance Maps [Longview, Texas, 1885, Sheet 2]
dct_description_sm: Originally published by Sanborn Map Co., New York; name of publisher and place of publication varies.
Fire insurance map, hand-colored to show building construction, locations of windows and doors, elevators, and available water facilities.
Shows factories, commercial occupancy of buildings, property boundaries and house and block numbers.
Includes notes on population, fire departments, and prevailing winds.
Includes location map and key to building colors and other features.

This scanned map image was georeferenced using an automated process developed by the UT Libraries. The code for used in this process can be accessed on GitHub at https://github.com/utlibraries/histmap-autogeoref-tools. If you discover significant issues with this automatically georeferenced map please contact gis@lib.utexas.edu to report the problem.
